name: Swift Earth Spirit
desc: A small earth spirit that can move quickly, but is not as hardy as others.

name: Heavy Earth Spirit
desc: An earth spirit that leans into the nature of its element, becoming heavy and immovable.

name: Swift Water Spirit
desc: A small water spirit that is as fast and fleeting as the rain.

name: Heavy Water Spirit
desc: A large water spirit as slow and reliable as the tides themselves.

name: Swift Wind Spirit
desc: A small wind spirit that flies as fast as an arrow.

name: Heavy Wind Spirit
desc: A large wind spirit that has a more corporeal form in exchange for moving slower.

name: Swift Flame Spirit
desc: A small flame spirit that can move quickly but vanishes like a candle flame.

name: Heavy Flame Spirit
desc: A flame spirit like a forge; difficult to quench and unstoppable.
